Type.Name: DrawBackgroundHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DrawBackgroundHandler(object o, DrawBackgroundArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DrawBackgroundHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DrawBackgroundHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DrawBackgroundHandler is removed from the event.
